markdownRemark.html:
First of all, thank you for taking the time to read this post. Allow me to introduce myself a little bit.

I’m Diomari Madulara. A software engineer based in Davao, Philippines. My journey started several years ago when our high school teacher introduced C language to our class. We did not make any serious application back then but I was hooked by the joy of inputting commands to a computer. For me, it felt revolutionary.

After getting a degree in Computer Science I worked on an agency where we use Python/Django to build web applications for businesses and startups. Since then, the majority of my time and effort goes to designing and building applications for the web.

This blog was created to serve as an archive for the things I’ve learned in my career. I usually write practical guides from building an application to sharing tools for both design and development work. I hope you can find value on the things being posted here.

Today, I currently work on a startup where we simplify the experience of renting. And hey! we are hiring.

Thank you for lending your time. Looking forward to sharing my journey with you.

frontmatter.title: Hello World
frontmatter.description: My journey started several years ago when our high school teacher introduced C language to our class. We did not make any serious application back then but I was hooked by the joy of inputting commands to a computer. For me, it felt revolutionary.
